column5: After years of reading this board faithfully, I figured I would join. I was a member for a long time,but never reregistered after the format change. Although I have never been much of a poster, I thought I would say Hello. I am mostly a shore fisher, and kinda wimpy about ice fishing,so pretty happy to see spring finally.
Welcome aboard - enjoy your stay. We accept pictures from shore fishers as well as from boats.   Don
Welcome sir. As a fellow ice-fishing wimp, let me say 'Hello'.
I second Rick's welcome as another ice-fishing wimp.
Well then ... Welcome back John.   I'm in with you ... never been out on the ice either.   The number of wimps is growing here.
Welcome to the board from yet another ice wimp.
I also am a wimp. welcome
Welcome John! I just say no to ice! I can`t walk on water, why push my luck! Seems like some people know how to do it though! Anyone else lurking out there? don`t be afraid to join in! LOL
Welcome JohnC!I am an icefisherman ice shelters have brought some  wimps back out on the hard water.

Hey John!  Welcome back to the board.  I suppose I'm also a fellow wimp...went ice fishing for the first time this past winter...cant say I'm all that impressed...LOL.  I am also a shore fisherman...hope to see some of your reports this year!
Welcome back John, another shore angler here. But I do try and get out on the ice.
